hero.title: Stories that turn care into motion.
hero.subtitle: One studio for health orgs, coalitions, and families who need editorial-grade stories that feel human and act like strategy.

logoCloud.heading: Trusted by teams who build for people

features.title: Research-grade rigor
features.description: Field reporting, public-health framing, and behavioral science inform every cut.

features.title: Community authorship
features.description: Co-create with the people closest to the story, on and off camera.

features.title: From content to consequence
features.description: Distribution aligned to services, hearings, and real local action.

studio.ethos: One practice, two doors: documentary crews for campaigns and an editorial portrait atelier for the people powering them. Same consent-forward workflows, same systems, different outputs.
bullets: Field kit: cinema + medium format stills
Data care: consent logs, secure storage
studio.quote: The map should learn from the foot that walks it. Our job is to listen, film, and translate care into images that move people to act.

practices.label: Change Studios
practices.title: Documentary & campaign production
practices.description: Micro-doc crews, reel systems, and policy testimony capture for public health and civic teams.

practices.label: Portrait Atelier
practices.title: Editorial portrait commissions
practices.description: Intentional still sessions for founders, families, and leadership teams who need artful imagery.

practices.label: Field Notes
practices.title: Research & process experiments
practices.description: Working notes, toolkits, and studies about how story moves care into action.

cta.label: Read why we build this way

systems.title: Listen → Field → Edit → Deliver
systems.description: Every engagement runs through the same care pipeline so strategy, film, and portrait work stay in sync.

steps.title: Listen
steps.description: Kitchen tables, clinics, and council halls.
steps.detail: Briefs built with the people closest to the story.

steps.title: Field
steps.description: Lean crews, redundant audio, consent-forward workflows.
steps.detail: Documentary teams + portrait atelier share kit + notes.

steps.title: Edit
steps.detail: Cutdowns, captions, proof galleries, and motion + still pairings.

steps.title: Deliver
steps.detail: Campaign toolkits, asset libraries, and insight memos.

serviceStacks.label: Change Studios
serviceStacks.title: Documentary retainers & campaign spikes
serviceStacks.description: Monthly or seasonal film coverage with strategy, field crew, and edit bench.
includes: Field audio, captions, and vertical cutdowns

serviceStacks.label: Portrait Atelier
serviceStacks.title: Editorial portrait commissions
serviceStacks.description: Intentional still sessions for leaders, founders, and families who need artful imagery.

includedKit: Included kit: Sony A7 IV cinema setup • Hasselblad + medium-format stills • SM7 + lav audio • dome + natural light kits • pro edit, captions, and print-ready files. Travel billed at IRS standard rate outside Denver metro.

testimonials.name: M. Alvarez
testimonials.quote: We saw sign-ups triple after the story pack. It changed the temperature of the room at council.

testimonials.name: D. Chen
testimonials.quote: They listen like researchers and shoot like filmmakers. The result moved our board to act.

testimonials.name: S. Patel
testimonials.quote: Fast, ethical, effective. The reels traveled further than any memo we’ve published this year.

faqs.question: How fast can you turn around a project?
faqs.answer: Event-to-edit is typically 72 hours. For docu-shorts, expect 2–4 weeks depending on scope.

faqs.question: Do you work outside Denver?
faqs.answer: Yes. Travel is billed at the IRS standard rate outside the Denver metro, with flexible remote pre-pro.

faqs.question: How do you measure impact?
faqs.answer: We use resonance (recall/belief shift), behavior (sign-ups, referrals), and systems (citations, adoption).

seo.title: CHANGE Media — One practice, two doors
seo.description: Documentary crews, portrait atelier, and care systems helping campaigns, coalitions, and families move people to act.
